stanza.line: Like as to make our appetite more (a)keen(/a)
With eager compounds we our palate (b)urge(/b)
We sicken to shun sickness when we (b)purge(/b)
Even so being full of your ne'er-cloying (c)sweetness(/c)
To bitter sauces did I frame my (d)feeding(/d)
And sick of welfare found a kind of (c)meetness(/c)
To be diseased ere that there was true (d)needing(/d)
The ills that were not grew to faults (f)assured(/f)
And brought to medicine a healthful (e)state(/e)
Which rank of goodness would by ill be (f)cured(/f)
But thence I learn and find the lesson (g)true(/g)
Drugs poison him that so feil sick of (g)you(/g)
